headline: Danaher Corporation (DHR): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Danaher Corporation (DHR) on FluentInQuality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on DHR. Danaher Corporation (DHR)’s share was trading at $202.62 as of 10th June. DHR’s trailing and forward P/E were 38.6 and 26.39 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Danaher is a masterclass in disciplined compounding, […]
